metadata.synopsis: Wyll has a suggestion for the players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: With Wyll in the party, read every hint in the Insight Puzzle (S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint1_ddc9f895-2055-4350-8552-93c705e6cca2S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint5_9ee65970-df25-4eb7-995e-7b2075e07a98S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint3_d697147b-159f-4329-b6e9-e31311c9dde0S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint2_64082582-01ac-4f30-b873-aa4554fb7881S_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint4_4f997741-bdc5-472d-a346-02b5b33dabfeS_WYR_InsightPuzzle_Hint6_ed43632d-49c6-4a50-bd00-bbd6dffcfc66)

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: The solution's plain as the High Moors in Midsummer. Let's chat.
